public class InterpolationService
extends java.lang.Object

Methods for interpolation of RealVectorFields (changing the resolution of the discretization)

Claas Abert

interpolate

public static RealVectorField interpolate(RealVectorField field,
                                          int dim,
                                          int cellCount)
Changes the resolution of the field in one direction. The field is interpolated with a third order approximation.

Parameters:
dim - the direction (dimension) to be scaled
cellCount - the new cell count in the direction
Returns:
the resulting field

the padded values

interpolate

public static RealVectorField interpolate(RealVectorField field,
                                          int[] cellCounts)
Triggers the direction based interpolate method to change the resolution of the field in all three directions

Parameters:
cellCounts - array of new cell counts
Returns:
the resulting field
